abstract: Spyker Cars, the Dutch maker of luxury autos, is still in talks with General Motors to buy its ailing Saab brand, but no deal has been reached, spokesmen for both sides said Monday.
snippet: Spyker Cars, the Dutch maker of luxury autos, is still in talks with General Motors to buy its ailing Saab brand, but no deal has been reached, spokesmen for both sides said Monday.
lead_paragraph: Spyker Cars, the Dutch maker of luxury cars, is still in talks with General Motors to buy its ailing Saab brand, but no deal has been reached, spokesmen for both sides said Monday.

headline.main: G.M. and Spyker Still in Talks Over Saab
